ygData.msgSnippet: songshawl is from second floor in hate, it replaced my worn cloth mantle... 10 ac 6 str/dex/agi/chr ... From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@yahoo.com] Sent: May
ygData.messageBody:
songshawl is from second floor in hate, it replaced my worn cloth mantle...
10 ac 6 str/dex/agi/chr

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: May 28, 2001 11:20 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] shoulders...



For me:
Sentry Pauldrons +12 AC +2 Strength +2 Agility +2 Dexterity +3 Magic Resist
+5 Mana
Not sure what a songshawl is, but it sounds way cool
"Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...> wrote: Just curious, i became the
happy owner of a songshawl last night, and was
wondering what other high level bards are using as a shoulderpiece... could
i be looking for a better shoulderpiece out there?

Minkin
Ayonae Ro
